description:
Creation EDT - A Timeless Arabian Fragrance Masterpiece

Discover the captivating allure of Creation Eau de Toilette, a magnificent oriental perfume that embodies the essence of luxury and sophistication. This 100ml fragrance masterfully blends rich and complex notes to create an unforgettable olfactory experience that lingers beautifully on the skin. ‚ú®

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
100ml Unisex Eau de Toilette Medium Creation

Exquisite Fragrance Notes

Top Notes Heart Notes Base Notes
Bergamot, Lemon, Cardamom üçã Rose, Jasmine, Saffron üå∏ Oud, Amber, Vanilla, Musk üåø

Key Features of Creation EDT

  • Long-lasting oriental fragrance with exceptional sillage üí´
  • Perfectly balanced composition suitable for all seasons
  • Luxurious oud and amber base that evolves beautifully throughout the day
  • Elegant bottle design that enhances any perfume collection üíé
  • Versatile unisex fragrance ideal for both casual and formal occasions

The story of Creation fragrances begins with a passion for Arabic perfumery traditions combined with modern perfume craftsmanship. Each bottle represents centuries of aromatic heritage, meticulously crafted to transport the wearer to the opulent world of Middle Eastern perfumery. The Creation EDT stands as a testament to this rich legacy, offering an accessible yet sophisticated entry into premium luxury fragrances. üî•

A Sensory Journey

When you wear Creation Eau de Toilette, you embark on a sensory journey that begins with vibrant citrus notes of bergamot and lemon, enhanced by the spicy warmth of cardamom. As the fragrance develops, a floral heart of rose and jasmine emerges, delicately spiced with precious saffron. The base reveals the true character of this Arabian fragrance - rich oud wood intertwined with creamy vanilla, warm amber, and sensual musk that creates a lasting impression. ‚ú®

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Creation EDT last on skin?
Creation Eau de Toilette offers impressive longevity for an EDT, typically lasting 6-8 hours on skin. The oud and amber base notes anchor the fragrance, while the concentration ensures the perfect balance between presence and subtlety. For extended wear, apply to pulse points and clothing (test fabric compatibility first), and consider layering with unscented lotion to enhance longevity and projection. Many customers report the Creation fragrance still detectable after a full day of wear. üí´

Experience the artistry of Creation EDT - where timeless perfumery traditions meet contemporary elegance in a bottle that captures the essence of luxury. Your signature scent awaits. ‚ú®
short_description: Creation EDT (100ml) is a luxurious unisex oriental fragrance blending vibrant citrus top notes, floral heart accords, and rich oud-amber base notes. This sophisticated Arabian perfume offers exceptional longevity and sillage, perfect for those seeking an elegant signature scent with Middle Eastern character.
